text: we've had a few updates in the last few
minutes let me run through them London
police say one man was pronounced dead
at the scene near North London mosque
and London Ambulance Service say they
have taken eight patients to hospital
following that incident so one man died
at the scene eight more people have been
taken to hospital in terms of the person
or persons who are alleged to have
carried this out to London police say at
this stage there are no reports of
people any persons having suffered any
knife injuries and also a van driver
aged 48 has been detained by members of
the public and arrested by the police so
let me just give you that update again
from the Metropolitan Police a 48 year
old van driver who was detained by
members of the public has been arrested
by the police and that confirms
something that we got from an eyewitness
a few hours ago that after whatever kind
of attack was carried out that this man
was among the crowd and it was members
of the public who pushed him forwards to
the police the police now confirming
that this 48 year old has been arrested
contrary to some reports through the
night they are saying that there are no
reports of any persons having suffered
any knife injuries nonetheless one
person has died at the scene and eight
people have been taken to hospital those
updates in the last few minutes
